# Hamin Lee - Full Stack Engineer

## Professional Summary
Full Stack Engineer specializing in Web, On-device LLM, Real-time Streaming, and Robotics.
Expertise in bridging mobile on-device AI with real-time media and robotics through streaming and low-latency control.
Privacy-focused architecture with PWA/Edge deployment for optimal user experience and performance.
End-to-end ownership from product initialization to deployment and operations automation.

## Core Competencies
- Full Stack Development: React, Next.js, Vue, Nuxt.js, Svelte Kit, TypeScript, JavaScript
- Backend: Node.js, Nest.js, Express.js, Prisma ORM, Drizzle ORM
- Database: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, Supabase
- Mobile: React Native, Expo, On-device AI (ONNX Runtime)
- Real-time Communication: WebRTC, WebSocket, UDP protocols
- Robotics: Robot control systems, SLAM mapping, Path planning
- AI/ML: On-device LLM, STT/TTS, Image processing (OpenCV)
- Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Vercel, Cloudflare, Docker, Railway
- Tools: Git, Electron.js, Web Bluetooth, PWA

## Current Position
CTO at POUL Inc. (June 2024 - October 2025)
- Lead engineer for "Lami App" - on-device LLM mobile application
- Designed and implemented WebView â†” Native bridge architecture
- Built on-device STT/TTS and image processing pipeline using ONNX Runtime, OpenCV, MMKV
- Developed AI-powered dashboard with Supabase database integration
- Implemented "Lami Robotics" - web-based robot control system for DeepRobotics Lite3
- Created UDP control protocol and WebRTC low-latency streaming
- Developed SLAM mapping UI and path planning operation interface
- Solo developed "Curiosity" - in-browser AI coding agent with WebContainer + Monaco

## Previous Experience

### Full Stack Developer at Abacus Technology (Nov 2022 - June 2024)
- Developed remote education platform using educational hardware
- Built real-time chat and video conferencing solution with WebRTC
- Used Next.js and MobX for frontend development
- Constructed backend with Supabase (PostgreSQL) and Nest.js, deployed on Railway
- Participated in ESP-32 based hardware firmware development
- Implemented web-based remote firmware updates
- Created browser-hardware communication using Web Bluetooth (no installation required)

### Full Stack Developer at Metamorp (June 2021 - Nov 2022)
- Participated in web-based 3D slicer program and platform development
- Component development using React, SCSS (BEM), MobX
- Implemented interaction-based Vector Animation
- Backend development with Nest.js, Prisma ORM, TypeScript
- Deployed using AWS Beanstalk, Aurora DB, Railway
- Ported Electron application to Intel Mac, Silicon Mac, and Linux
- Built Redis-based Pub/Sub server for real-time Electron app update deployment system

## Open Source Projects
- **mugunghwa**: Korean word shuffling algorithm library
- **gauss-spiral**: Gaussian spiral generation library
- **edge-crypto**: Edge-compatible cryptographic utilities
- **biggest**: Array element comparison utility
- **pseudo-shuffle**: Deterministic shuffling algorithm
- **curse-script**: Korean curse word filtering library
